text: two days ago it was this moldovan ship
the blue sky n that had to be rescued by
the Italian Coast Guard it was carrying
around 900 people trying to get to
Europe abandoned by the crew thought to
be people smugglers it was later towed
into the Italian Court of Gallipoli and
now for the second time in less than a
week a second separate but very similar
case a ship registered in Sierra Leone
carrying around 400 migrants lost power
and was drifting 60 kilometers of the
southern coast of Italy one of the
people on board managed to operate the
radio and got a message to the Italian
coastguard they said we are without crew
we are heading towards the Italian coast
and we have no one to steer Italian
authorities began a rescue operation
they asked for the help of this
icelandic boat the tier it happened to
be nearby on a separate patrol mission
the Italian Air Force also launched a
helicopter the to authorities the
Italian in the Icelandic are now trying
to help those on board the stricken
vessel been bland BBC News
